input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Zuph has a direct effect on wibl. Uvzi has a direct effect on wibl. Method 1: We look directly at how zuph correlates with uvzi in general. Method 2: We look at this correlation case by case according to wibl. To understand how zuph affects uvzi, is it more correct to use the Method 1 than Method 2?
